clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: Marketing information: some partners may provide additional (aggregated) information, for instance through their Software Developer Kits (SDKs). This may contain demographic or behavioural information in order for us to personalize content, advertisements and offers and to find the right audience for our advertisements

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:
Therefore, we recommend that you review the Terms from time to time and take note of any changes.
By continuing your use of the Services you accept the amended Terms.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text:
WeTransfer only checks the (one) website you visited prior to your visit to one of our websites.
We do not track the website you visit after you leave our website.

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text: In order to connect with our target audience, we might use sequential messaging, which is basically a form of storytelling: each time you interact with our Services on a different device, you may receive a slightly different ad in a different form, but the ads are part of the same story

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: we use your personal information for marketing and (interest based) advertising

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Cookie or web beacon information: cookie IDs and settings and other personal information received through cookies, web beacons or pixel tags.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text: If we use your device based, precise GPS-location, we will make sure we only do so after receiving your consent.

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text: Business partners: we collaborate with advertising partners, marketing and communication agencies. We do this for (interest based) advertising, branding and reaching out to you. Our advertising partners implement their own tracking cookies which fall under their terms of services and privacy &. cookie statement. Please find a list of all third party cookies and their privacy policies here.

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
We’re a global business, which means we might share or store personal information in countries outside of the European Economic Area (“EEA”).
Those countries have different data protection laws in place.
However, when we transfer- and host data globally, we will make sure that appropriate safeguards are in place in order to ensure your personal information enjoys a similar level of protection as it would within the EEA.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
You can ask WeTransfer to:

  1. access, receive a copy of or correct your personal information;
  2. in certain cases, erase your personal information or block or restrict our use of it

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: WeTransfer does not claim ownership of your Content.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.
clauses.clause_text: To make sure this Statement is easy to read, each question has a drop down with a short explanation, followed by a more formal statement.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read

clauses.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
clauses.clause_text: WeTransfer is not responsible or liable for third party content published within the Services, in-ad links to external websites or the content, products or services offered on external websites.

case.text: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: Any liability for damages relating to the Content lies with the individual that creates, uses, stores and/or shares it within the Services.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text:
Note that WeTransfer may revise this Privacy &amp.
Cookie Statement from time to time.
Each revised version shall be dated and posted on the website.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: WeTransfer makes no warranty that the Services are available on an uninterrupted, secure or error-free basis.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text:
As a condition to make use of the Services you agree not to create, use, store or share any Content that:

  • features CSAI (child sexual abuse imagery);
  • is obscene, defamatory, libelous, slanderous, profane, indecent, discriminating, threatening, abusive, harmful, lewd, vulgar, or unlawful;

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: Your use of the Services is at your own risk.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You are only allowed to use the Services when aged 16 or older.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
clauses.clause_text: WeTransfer reserves the right to investigate, provide to third parties, (temporarily) block and/or permanently delete from it servers, without prior notice or liability, any Content and/or account information or to block anyone from accessing any part of the Services, when WeTransfer ascertains, at its sole discretion or after receiving substantiated and valid complaints, that you breach these Terms or act in violation of any applicable law or regulation.

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: You agree not to use the Services to commit, promote, enable or facilitate any unlawful or criminal acts or breach of these Terms or facilitate or promote others to do so.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If any (part of a) provision of these Terms is found to be illegal, unenforceable or otherwise invalid, then (i) the rest of the Terms will remain in full force and effect to the extent permissible under or consistent with the relevant laws. and (ii) that part will be deemed to be deleted and substituted by a valid one which in its economic effect comes closest to the invalid part.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Network information: IP-addresses and mobile network information.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
